member.name: IDXGIDevice.CreateSurface
member.summary: Returns a surface. This method is used internally and you should not call it directly in your application.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that describes the surface.
The number of surfaces to create.
A DXGI_USAGE flag that specifies how the surface is expected to be used.
An optional pointer to a structure that contains shared resource information for opening views of such resources.
The address of an interface pointer to the first created surface.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; an error code otherwise. For a list of error codes, see DXGI_ERROR.

member.name: IDXGIDevice.GetAdapter
member.summary: Returns the adapter for the specified device.
member.param: The address of an interface pointer to the adapter. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns one of the DXGI_ERROR that indicates failure. If the pAdapter parameter is NULL this method returns E_INVALIDARG.

member.name: IDXGIDevice.GetGPUThreadPriority
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a value that indicates the current GPU thread priority. The value will be between -7 and 7, inclusive, where 0 represents normal priority.
member.returns: Return S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns E_POINTER if the pPriority parameter is NULL.

member.name: IDXGIDevice.QueryResourceResidency
member.summary: Gets the residency status of an array of resources.
member.param: An array of flags. Each element describes the residency status for corresponding element in the ppResources argument array.
The number of resources in the ppResources argument array and pResidencyStatus argument array.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns DXGI_ERROR_DEVICE_REMOVED, E_INVALIDARG, or E_POINTER (see Common HRESULT Values and WinError.h for more information).

member.name: IDXGIDevice.SetGPUThreadPriority
member.param: A value that specifies the required GPU thread priority. This value must be between -7 and 7, inclusive, where 0 represents normal priority.
member.returns: Return S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns E_INVALIDARG if the Priority parameter is invalid.

member.name: IDXGIDevice
member.summary: An IDXGIDevice interface implements a derived class for DXGI objects that produce image data.
